summary: I was a little fed up when I decided to join up with the Dawnguard at how useless their armor is if you\'re at any decent level at all. So, I fixed them.
descriptionHtml:
Basically my main goal in this was to rebalance the Dawnguard armor pieces. The heavy armor set is a disgrace, and the light armor isn\'t much better. Now, the two sets are slightly above (1 or 2 points of base armor) Steel Plate and Scaled, respectively. I also changed the Rune Shield to not be so pathetic, and added a heavy variant. I don\'t know how to add the heavy variant to, say, a crafting menu, so you could swap the two out, but I\'ll look around.

Eventually, I want to expand this mod to the vampire armor, and *maybe* the weapons, though weapons seem to get modded a lot more than armor, so I might just leave them well enough alone. 

Also, if you\'re using the heavy set, for God\'s sake, use this: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23935/
author: Salivific
